heroes.name: barbarianking
heroes.abilitydesc: The Barbarian King summons barbarians at his command, and rages himself and his militia
heroes.note: Barbarians summoned are the same level as your lab progress.

heroes.name: archerqueen
heroes.abilitydesc: The Archer Queen summons archers at her command, and goes invisible for a short period
heroes.note: Archers summoned are the same level as your lab progress.

heroes.name: grandwarden
heroes.abilitydesc: Increase the max hp of troops inside the Grand Wardens ring. All troops in the Grand Wardens ring become invincible

heroes.name: royalchampion
heroes.abilitydesc: The Royal Champion throws her defense seeking shield, doing massive damage while recovering health
heroes.note: Archers summoned are the same level as your lab progress.
